subject: Nutrition
title: How Food Habits Form
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: How Food Habits Form.

hook.text: You make over 200 food decisions daily, and 90% are automatic. Habits run your diet.

buildup.text: The brain converts repeated eating behaviors into automatic routines stored in the basal ganglia.

discovery.text: It takes 66 days on average to form a new eating habitâ€”not the commonly claimed 21 days.

twist.text: Changing your environment is twice as effective as willpower. Move the fruit bowl and cookies disappear.

climax.text: The best diet changes don't fight old habitsâ€”they replace them with new ones using the same cues.

punchline.text: Change the environment and the habit follows.
